Step 2: Upgrade to a Subscription Plan That Offers a Free Dollar Card Although Changera offers different plans, only the Blue Plan and Gold Plan come with a free virtual and physical dollar card. Blue Plan – Best for freelancers, remote workers, and travelers who need a reliable dollar card for moderate transactions. Gold Plan – Ideal for high-spending individuals and businesses that require higher limits and premium features.
To upgrade, go to the subscription section in the Changera app and select the plan that suits your needs. Step 3: Complete Your KYC Verification Since Changera prioritizes security and compliance, all users must complete Know Your Customer (KYC) verification before obtaining a dollar card.

Your virtual card will be instantly available in the app, while your physical card will be processed and delivered to your registered address. You can easily add funds to your card from your Changera wallet using various funding options available in the app.
Once your card is loaded, you can use it for:

Here’s why Changera’s dollar card is the best option for international payments:

Seamless Global Transactions – Use your card on any platform, including PayPal, Google Ads, and Facebook Ads. Quick and Secure Transactions – Your payments are processed instantly and securely.
Most importantly, Changera is trusted by thousands of users across the globe who rely on its services for hassle-free international transactions.
